articles.description: Former world heavyweight champion Leon Spinks, best known for defeating Muhammad Ali in 1978, has died at the age 67, according to a statement from his publicist.
articles.content:

articles.author: Brian Stelter, Chief Media Correspondent
articles.title: Analysis: The end of the road for Lou Dobbs
articles.description: Nothing unusual happened when Lou Dobbs hosted his Fox Business show on Thursday evening. His hour was full of Fox's usual themes about "radical Dims" (Democrats) and Big Tech "abusing their power."

articles.title: Trump's ex-communications director has advice ahead of trial
articles.description: Alyssa Farah, former White House communications director under Donald Trump, comments on the former President's upcoming impeachment trial, saying she would advise Trump to focus on constitutional issues.

articles.title: Why the generals really took back power in Myanmar
articles.description: A strangely familiar sight dominated the front pages of Myanmar's state-owned newspaper this week: photos of men in green military uniforms sitting in seats of power.

articles.title: 'QAnon Shaman': 'Trump is still our president'
articles.description: New video shows Jacob Chansley, the so-called "QAnon Shaman," moments after the January 6 Capitol insurrection saying former President Trump is "still our president" and boasting how he "won the day." CNN's Pamela Brown and Donie O'Sullivan discuss.

articles.title: Disney World cancels Super Bowl Parade due to the pandemic
articles.description: As fans prepare to watch Super Bowl LV on Sunday, Disney has some bad news: There will be no Super Bowl victory parade down the Magic Kingdom's Main Street U.S.A. this year due to the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Wyoming Republican: Cheney's vote was 'middle finger' to residents
articles.description: The Wyoming Republican Party has voted to formally censure Rep. Liz Cheney, the No. 3 Republican in the House, for her vote to impeach former President Donald Trump. CNN's Suzanne Malveaux reports.
